mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.name AS "name", a.price AS "price", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sort_id AS "sort.id", s.name AS "sort.name", u2.name AS "user.name", o3.name AS "office.name", a4.name AS "area.name"
